title: Runner's Heartbeat Smartphone Grip 5k Marathon Running Gift PopSockets Grip and Stand for Phones and Tablets
features: Great gift for anyone who loves to run! Simple, clean design features a runner worked into an EKG Heartbeat Pulse Line - the perfect design for any smartphone or tablet!
Official "Running Shirts TShirts & Gifts for Men Who Run" Brand Smartphone Grip and Stand for Phones and Tablets - the ultimate design for anyone who tracks or maps their run using Phones and GPS

PopGrip with swappable top; switch out your PopTop for another design or remove it completely for wireless charging capabilities. (Not compatible with Apple MagSafe wireless charger or MagSafe wallet.)
Expandable stand to watch videos, take group photos, FaceTime, and Skype handsfree.
Advanced adhesive allows you to remove and reposition on most devices and cases.

Note: Will not stick to some silicone, waterproof, or highly textured cases. Works best with smooth, hard plastic cases. Will adhere to iPhone 11, but not to the iPhone 11 Pro nor the iPhone 11 ProMax without a suitable case.
description: At Running Shirts TShirts & Gifts for Men Who Run, we love to run - and, as runners, our heart beats for the trail! That's why we created this awesome Runner Smartphone Grip and Stand for Phones and Tablets - the ultimate gift for running enthusiasts!
